name: Old Couple - Endless Runner
description:
A game made by Videogame Course Students for a project made by Cinema course students, at Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnolgias. This game was developed by Afonso Rosa, André Vitorino and Catarina Matias.

Use A or D to dodge the traffic and holes that will be presented on your way to escape you children trying to catch you and be happy together.
